Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider

package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider
Contains base classes for various data providers.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    AdvancementProviderBase.TaskFactory
    A task factory can define multiple tasks.
    BlockLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier
    Interface to modify a singleton loot entry to a new loot entry.
    BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory
    Interface to get a loot entry from a block.
    BlockLootProviderBase.LootModifier
    Interface to modify a singleton loot entry to a new singleton loot entry.
    BlockLootProviderBase.SimpleLootFactory
    Interface to get a singleton loot entry from a block.
    EntityLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier
    Interface to modify a singleton loot entry to a new loot entry.
    EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory
    Interface to get a loot entry from an entity.
    EntityLootProviderBase.LootModifier
    Interface to modify a singleton loot entry to a new singleton loot entry.
    EntityLootProviderBase.SimpleLootFactory
    Interface to get a singleton loot entry from an entity.
